metadata.title: CVE-2024-4207 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting allversions starting from 5.1 prior 17.0.6, starting from 17.1 prior to17.1.4, and starting from 17.2 prior to 17.2.2. When viewing an XML file ina repository in raw mode, it can be made to render as HTML if viewed underspecific circumstances.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
